net.runelite.client.ui

Class DynamicGridLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.GridLayout
      • net.runelite.client.ui.DynamicGridLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, Serializable

    public class DynamicGridLayout
extends GridLayout
    Grid layout implementation with support for cells with unequal size. See https://www.javaworld.com/article/2077486/core-java/java-tip-121--flex-your-grid-layout.html
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
